title: 88/252/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 March 1988 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Belgium pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 28 March 1988
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Belgium pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
(88/252/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Taking into account the provisions relating to the fixation of the reference income for 1987, the measures adopted in Belgium pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 continue to meet the conditions for a financial contribution from the Community to the common measures provided for in Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85.
This Decision is addressed to Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 March 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 167, 26. 6. 1987, p. 1.
